Welcome to Renzo’s documentation!¶

Contents:

  • Getting started
    • Prepare your server
  • Upgrading
    • Upgrading Node-types source entities
  • Moving a website to another server
  • Creating a theme
    • Static routing
    • Dynamic routing

Renzo is a polymorphic CMS based on a node system which can handle many type of services. It’s based on Symfony components and Doctrine ORM for maximum performances and security.
